root.cn: 儿童猜猜乐是专为儿童精心设计的早教游戏， 玩法简单，只要猜出图片中动物，水果，蔬菜，花卉，交通工具等的名字即可,可以大幅提高宝宝识别生活中常见的事物，同时也可以提高对汉字的学习，是妈妈们早教的好帮手！宝宝们赶快来体验吧！
root.en: Children guess music is a well-designed early game designed for children. Play simple, as long as guess the pictures of animals, fruits, vegetables, flowers, vehicles, etc. name can greatly improve the baby's recognition of common things in life, but also can improve the learning of Chinese characters, is a good help for mothers to teach early! Come on, baby!
